00054 enum btSliderFlags
00055 {
00056         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_DIRLIN = (1 << 0),
00057         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_DIRLIN = (1 << 1),
00058         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_DIRANG = (1 << 2),
00059         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_DIRANG = (1 << 3),
00060         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_ORTLIN = (1 << 4),
00061         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_ORTLIN = (1 << 5),
00062         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_ORTANG = (1 << 6),
00063         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_ORTANG = (1 << 7),
00064         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_LIMLIN = (1 << 8),
00065         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_LIMLIN = (1 << 9),
00066         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_CFM_LIMANG = (1 << 10),
00067         BT_SLIDER_FLAGS_ERP_LIMANG = (1 << 11)
00068 };

00271         void setFrames(const btTransform& frameA, const btTransform& frameB) 
00272         {

00275                 calculateTransforms(m_rbA.getCenterOfMassTransform(),m_rbB.getCenterOfMassTransform());
00276                 buildJacobian();

00303 struct btSliderConstraintData
00304 {
00305         btTypedConstraintData   m_typeConstraintData;
00306         btTransformFloatData m_rbAFrame; // constraint axii. Assumes z is hinge axis.
00307         btTransformFloatData m_rbBFrame;
00308         
00309         float   m_linearUpperLimit;
00310         float   m_linearLowerLimit;
00311 
00312         float   m_angularUpperLimit;
00313         float   m_angularLowerLimit;
00314 
00315         int     m_useLinearReferenceFrameA;
00316         int m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame;
00317 
00318 };
00319 
00320 
00321 struct btSliderConstraintDoubleData
00322 {
00323         btTypedConstraintDoubleData     m_typeConstraintData;
00324         btTransformDoubleData m_rbAFrame; // constraint axii. Assumes z is hinge axis.
00325         btTransformDoubleData m_rbBFrame;
00326         
00327         double  m_linearUpperLimit;
00328         double  m_linearLowerLimit;
00329 
00330         double  m_angularUpperLimit;
00331         double  m_angularLowerLimit;
00332 
00333         int     m_useLinearReferenceFrameA;
00334         int m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame;
00335 
00336 };
00337 
00338 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE               int     btSliderConstraint::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00339 {
00340         return sizeof(btSliderConstraintData2);
00341 }
00342 
00344 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btSliderConstraint::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00345 {
00346 
00347         btSliderConstraintData2* sliderData = (btSliderConstraintData2*) dataBuffer;
00348         btTypedConstraint::serialize(&sliderData->m_typeConstraintData,serializer);
00349 
00350         m_frameInA.serialize(sliderData->m_rbAFrame);
00351         m_frameInB.serialize(sliderData->m_rbBFrame);
00352 
00353         sliderData->m_linearUpperLimit = m_upperLinLimit;
00354         sliderData->m_linearLowerLimit = m_lowerLinLimit;
00355 
00356         sliderData->m_angularUpperLimit = m_upperAngLimit;
00357         sliderData->m_angularLowerLimit = m_lowerAngLimit;
00358 
00359         sliderData->m_useLinearReferenceFrameA = m_useLinearReferenceFrameA;
00360         sliderData->m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame = m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame;
00361 
00362         return btSliderConstraintDataName;
00363 }
